title: Implement Connection.setReadOnly, Statement.set/getFetchSize, ResultSet.getType
description: Connection.setReadOnly, Statement.set/getFetchSize, ResultSet.getType are necessary for IntelliJ to be able to execute queries against Solr JDBC.

comments.author: Kevin Risden
comments.content:

comments.author: Kevin Risden
